tool_description:
Get insider positions of popular investors.
Open data from SEC database.
name: Top Investors
title: Top Investors

api_list.name: Get investors list
api_list.description: Return information about every an investor
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://top-investors.p.rapidapi.com/api/v0.1/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "top-investors.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get investor portfolio
api_list.description:
Return dict of all current positions in investor portfolio.
Use request « investors list » for getting investors id.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://top-investors.p.rapidapi.com/api/v0.1/investor/SAM"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "top-investors.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://top-investors.p.rapidapi.com/api/v0.1/investor/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "top-investors.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
